title: 01/04/21 - HOUR 2 - David Pollack & Sal Paolantonio
itunes:title: 01/04/21 - HOUR 2 - David Pollack & Sal Paolantonio
description:
In hour 2 David Pollack joins to talk Urban Meyer possibly heading to Jacksonville, how ready is Devonta Smith is for the NFL being a smaller Wide-out. Also comparing college systems that makes college kids ready for the NFL. Sal Paolantonio calls in to talk about the outrage Philly fans had about Doug Peterson not going all in for National spotlight game.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
